duties_responsibilities.duty: Collaborate with clients to define project scope, objectives, and deliverables.
Lead cross-functional project teams, including architects, engineers, contractors, and other specialists.
Ensure that all project deliverables meet or exceed client expectations and quality standards.
Allocate and manage project resources effectively, including personnel and technology.
Maintain clear and open communication channels with clients and team members.
Monitor project budgets, track expenses, and ensure cost control throughout the project lifecycle.
Foster strong client relationships through exceptional service and communication.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Construction Management, Engineering, Business Administration, or a related field
